msbt.message: Hey! Got a minute? Wanna flex your finding muscles on a little treasure hunt, ?
Sure!
Not now...
Let me run something by youâ€” treasure hunt. As in, want to play a treasure hunt game with me?
Yeah!
Not now...
Ooh, my brain muscle just flexed all on its own! I think we should do a treasure hunt! Wanna give it a shot?
OK!
No, thanks.
Yesss! Let's do it!I'll go hide some treasure, so hold on just a minute.
Alright, then! Let's do it! OK, first I'm gonna go hide something, so wait here.
Nice! Game on! OK, I'm gonna go hide some treasure so you just wait right there, .
Wait a sec. How'd it get so late?Yeah, we'll have to save this for another day. We'll never be able to hunt treasure this late at night.
No dice? Maybe some other time.
Aw, barbells! OK, next time then, .
Aw, too bad. But if you're not feeling it, you're not feeling it. Next time!

OK, here's how to play<10_7 arg="120" />I buried some treasure. If you find it within the time limit, you win!<10_7 arg="180" />It's buried somewhere outside, so there's no need to muscle into anyone's place. Now let's do this!<10_7 arg="240" />

OK, here's how to play<10_7 arg="120" />I buried some treasure. If you find it within the time limit, you win!<10_7 arg="180" />It's buried somewhere outside, so there's no need to barge into anyone's place.<10_7 arg="180" />Oh, and this is strictly a one-on-one contest. Others can watch and cheer us on, though!<10_7 arg="180" />Alright, let's do this, !<10_7 arg="240" />

OK, here's how to play.<10_7 arg="120" />I buried some treasure, and if you find it within the time limit, you win!<10_7 arg="180" />You'll have less time than normal, though, so it's gonna be a little harder. OK! Let's get going!<10_7 arg="240" />

OK, here's how to play.<10_7 arg="120" />I buried some treasure, and if you find it within the time limit, you win!<10_7 arg="180" />Oh, and this is strictly a one-on-one contest. Others can watch and cheer us on, though!<10_7 arg="180" />You'll have less time than normal, though, so it's gonna be a little harder. OK! Let's get going!<10_7 arg="240" />
First off Do you want to hear the rules, ?
Sure.
Nah.
Let's get started, then!<10_7 arg="60" />
Alright! Oh yeah, one quick thing. This is a one-on-one contest, so only you can dig up treasure.<10_7 arg="180" />OK! Let's get started, !<10_7 arg="120" />
Heh, there's a time limit, so this might be tough. Good luck!<10_7 arg="120" />

There's a real short time limit, so this is gonna be tough!<10_7 arg="120" />Oh yeah, one quick thing. This is a one-on-one contest, so only you can dig up treasure.<10_7 arg="180" />OK! Let's get started, !<10_7 arg="120" />
Hey, if you've got timedo you wanna do a treasure hunt with me, ?
Oh, it's on!
Sorry.

Check this out, I was trying to think of a fun way for an amateur like you to build some muscle, then it hit meTreasure hunt! You should totally play a treasure-hunt game with me.Running around the island, digging holes for treasure What a great way to train, !
I'm up for that!
Not feelin' it.
Whoa! How'd it get so late? It's too dark to see anything, let alone treasure. Let's try some other time.
Sweet! I'm gonna go hide some treasure. Wait here, !
No? Not gonna happen? Well, maybe someday you'll change your mind.
Wait. What?! I just realized how late it is! You can't look for treasure in the dark! That's not fair to you.We'll try again some other time.
Alright! I'll go hide some treasure, so just hang out here.
No? But Huh, I thought it was such a good idea, .
I couldn't find a good spot to hide my treasure. I looked everywhere!Oh well. Some other time, I guess. .
